\begin{lstlisting}[language=c,caption=Problem 1 Print Task, label=list:p1_task2]
void hello_task2(void *pvParameters) {
    while (1) {
        ulTaskNotifyTake(pdTRUE, 100);

        PRINTF("Hello %s.\r\n", usr_str);

        vTaskDelay(1000 / portTICK_PERIOD_MS);
    }
}
\end{lstlisting}
